Test Name: Dengue Virus Antibody, IgG and IgM, Serum
Purpose: Detection of IgG and IgM antibodies specific to Dengue virus in patient serum via ELISA.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Microplate reader (ELISA reader), microplate washer, incubator (37Â°C), micropipettes, vortex mixer
